title: Micah, The Fierce Nails Emma The Brave
description: In part two, Micah, the aloof, professional hockey player, & Emma, the compassionate salon owner, fling themselves into an erotic adventure. Their first night culminates in hot, dirty sex that leaves them wanting more. They continue to explore each other with sensual delights & rich conversation. Along the way, they discover how much fun they have with one another. Do they have a future together?Other stories in this Micah, The Fierce Takes On Emma, The Brave (pt. 1) Micah, The Fierce Dominates Emma, The Brave (pt. 3)Please check me out on facebook
author: Jessa Eden
